Installation#

Anaconda#

If you do not have a working Python 3.5 or 3.6 installation, consider installing Miniconda. Then run:

conda install cython numpy pandas scipy scikit-learn matplotlib seaborn bokeh statsmodels h5py

Pull ailist from PyPI (consider using pip3 to access Python 3):

pip install pysam
pip install cfdna

PyPI only#

If you prefer to exclusively use PyPI run:

pip install cfdna
On this page
  • Anaconda
  • PyPI only
